text: Come leave us a message on our forums at http://t.co/6TQKRnrIU6 we are going to start adding customized pages to our website. #gamedev
The Studio has decided to up the ante by converting Bare Bones to Java! What is your favorite programming language? #gamedev #programming

Happy Birthday Jordan (Jamlammin/Jam Lemon)!
He's our wonderful music producer, He deserves a round of applause from you all. #birthday

Don't forget you can hit us up on Facebook here: http://t.co/ZmeH5C6nf9
And also, our Forums: http://t.co/YjPPz2oPEo #indiedev
A late happy birthday for our wonderful graphic designer, Tyler! #birthday
Discussions on improving our Forums are underway, but come join me for the mean time: http://t.co/iE52sKtLEH
Our lead developer is now on Fall break! Time to pump out some code! #indiedev #gamedev #programming
Discussions between our developers on our website design are, yet again, under way! What do you want to see? #indiedev #webdevelopment
Great news! The textures for all floor themes have been fully developed! What do you guys think? #design #indiedev http://t.co/SbOsee69yj
Booleshark's Facebook doesn't eat people, but it does provide you some lengthy posts if you throw us a like! http://t.co/oUjfUKBUrW
Tyler has been working diligently on drafting some textures for the maps in Bare Bones! Thoughts? #indiedev #design http://t.co/cQ1FFtaHA0
A not-so-new face picking up some new roles at #Booleshark! Everybody give a warm re-welcoming to Ricky. #indiedev
@chrissanders3 @TheIndieSloth Of course, and that is our primary goal, but what we want to know is what makes you want to play games.
What makes a "good" game? Come tell us what you think on our forums! http://t.co/jSXMB6TC7c #indiedev #gamedev #gaming
The Booleshark Official Forums are now live! Come chat with us at http://t.co/lefvSLCyba! The homepage will redirect there soon! #gamedev
The Booleshark forums will be publicly accessible beginning tomorrow (September 16). We look forward to seeing all of you there!
We are currently in the process of developing the sprites (character models, object models, etc.) for Bare Bones. #indiedev #gaming
A gesture of appreciation on behalf of the Studio goes out to the US military, fire squads, etc. for our safe nation. http://t.co/b6rAZAr2bu
@1e4_ MyBB has been suggested by our developers as well, but for now we are sticking with WP. We are considering something else soon though.
The Studio has decided to install a 3rd-party forum software to ensure that our forum's security is top-notch. Forums coming soon! #indiedev
Follow us on Facebook for exclusive updates regarding the development of our up and coming dungeon crawler - Bare Bones! #indiedev #gamedev
We have finally reached 100 followers, and we are appreciative towards every single one of you guys. You are what makes us, us! #indiedev
@EpicChambers A great friend of mine once said, "Never discourage someone who makes continual progress, no matter how slow."
@IndyGamingDaily Steam seems to be one of the most popular when it comes to initial releases and gaining awareness of your product.
@Vital_dev Great gameplay is only present in well-designed products.
Our Sketch Artist is almost finished with her sketch of the Great Serpent - a Bare Bones boss! Suggest a name for this creature! #indiedev
What do you think of our new cover photo? Tell us what you think! #indiedev #design #GraphicDesign http://t.co/vXdoIevzex
What is your favorite game and what makes it so special? Let us know! #gaming #gamedesign

Our lead developer encountered several bugs with the design of our website earlier today. The release has been postponed until August 23rd.
By tomorrow, our website will be polished with the most up-to-date algorithms to reflect our new design approach. #Startups #indiedev
Please like us on Facebook! Twitter limits us to 140 characters; we can provide more detailed updates on Facebook! http://t.co/81kt5hEkYq

RT @JamesSager: People think the hard part of making video games is the programming/design/art.  The hard part is making one that will sell…
RT @Aaron_Saluk: Starting any business takes time, effort, money, and personal sacrifices #indiedev isn't special or unique that way.
@TownEater Very cool! Keep up the great work.
Now hiring a graphic design artist capable of producing high-quality, 2D sprites for our upcoming Indie Game! #graphicdesign #alldev
